metadata.title: CVE-2020-26955 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: When a user downloaded a file in Firefox for Android, if a cookie is set,it would have been re-sent during a subsequent file download operation onthe same domain, regardless of whether the original and subsequent requestwere in private and non-private browsing modes. *Note: This issue onlyaffected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 83.

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
